title: Producer  – Central Tech
content:
Come join the Central Technology team at Zynga to make an impact across all of the company’s games! Our team provides products and services that are foundational for building games across mobile and emerging platforms. These services span across Identity, Social, Payments, Core Technology, Client Tech, Automation, and Cloud. Our mission is a ‘Lean Mean Tech Organization’ that enables game teams to develop and launch amazing games. We are a 100+ people organization servicing 1500 others across 13 global locations.
Central Technology is looking for a highly motivated Producer / Technical Project Manager to lead the product adoption and project execution within our Game Services vertical. This position will be based in Bangalore India.
The Producer will work closely with Leadership and our Engineering partners in defining our product strategy, evangelizing and driving customer adoption, and delivering our projects to our game teams. The successful candidate will need to be able to navigate comfortably between strategy and tactics, build strong relationships with our customers, drive consensus, and not be afraid to roll up their sleeves to get things done. This is a unique opportunity as this role combines both the Project Management and Product Management function into one. If this sounds like you, we would love to hear from you!
Main Responsibilities

Provides project management leadership and drives project execution of the team
Drives the evangelization and adoption of our automation frameworks as part of the game team’s development / release pipeline
Responsible for the product life cycle, from gathering requirements, prioritizing features, aligning across, and owning the team roadmap
Ensures the successful project delivery, on scope, on time, and on budget
Leads technical scrums and agile project implementation
Corresponds with internal and external partners to achieve consensus
Ability to balance player, partner, and business interests while considering technical integration tradeoffs
Partners closely with Engineering, Product Management, and Production leadership to deliver outstanding products and services
Helps foster a culture of stimulating and fun work environment

Desired Strengths and Experience:

3+ years of experience in a Technical Project Management / Project Management role in the tech industry
1+ years agile development experience
Experience with automation test frameworks such as Appium / Selenium
Proven ability to successfully drive adoption & deliver customer projects
Outstanding written / oral, organizational, analytical skills, with strong attention to detail
Strong partner engagement & project management skills, and ability to present work to executive staff
Ability to zoom in and zoom out comfortably
Ability to make sound judgment under pressure
Ability to work in a team environment with maturity, leadership, and calm confidence
Demonstrated ability to empower and earn the team’s trust
Must be a driven self-starter
Possess strong negotiation skills with proven ability to resolve conflict
Ability to communicate across diverse cultures, work styles, and personalities

Preferred Skills:

Experience in the game industry or platform services
Computer science, Software Engineering degree, and/or equivalent software development experience
Project Management certification
Software experience with Atlassian Jira, Confluence, Google Docs / Sheets / Slides, Miro

What we offer you

Work in a studio that has complete P&L ownership of games
Create next-gen games that will be played and loved by millions of players around the world
Work in a collaborative team that invests in your development and growth on-the-job
Competitive salary, bonus plan and Employee Stock Purchase Plan
20 days annual leave + company holidays
Extended medical coverage that includes OPD, dental, vision and telehealth
Group Life, Disability and Critical Illness insurance
Equitable Childcare facilities for all employees
Virtual mental health and neurodiversity support programs
Family planning and nurturing support programs
 Comprehensive leave options and flexible working hours to ensure work life balance.
Keep your health on track with our wellbeing programs covering fitness expenses and complimentary meals served around the clock
Employee Assistance Programs
Around the year employee events and casual dress every single day
A diverse team of friendly, fun and supportive co-workers to work with and, impact millions of daily players
Re-engage with your special interest by being a part of our employee resource groups that connect Zyngites through inclusivity, culture, lifestyle and fun

 
Zynga is an equal opportunity employer. We are proud of our diverse community; we do not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, medical condition, disability, or any other class or characteristic protected by applicable law. We welcome candidates, players, employees, and partners from all backgrounds. Join us!
Zynga will consider employment for all applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with applicable law.
Zynga is committed to providing reasonable accommodation to applicants with disabilities. If you need accommodation during the interview process, please let us know.
Zynga does not  engage in financial exchanges during the recruitment or onboarding process. We do not conduct job interviews over third-party messaging apps such as Telegram, WhatsApp or others. We will never ask you for your personal or financial information over unofficial chat channels. Our in-house recruitment team only contacts individuals via official company email addresses (i.e., via a zynga.com or naturalmotion.com email domain).
If you believe you have been the victim of a scam, you may wish to contact the authorities. In the United States, you may file a complaint with the FBI. More information is available here: https://www.ic3.gov.

demographic_questions.description:
As part of our Diversity and Inclusion Strategy we would like to collect demographic information from job candidates to identify and implement strategies to understand and improve equal opportunity for all at Zynga. Completion of this information is entirely voluntary and any details you provide will not be considered in the hiring process. Zynga will anonymize demographic information for reporting and analytics to gain a better understanding of our hiring process. This  information will only be used internally within Zynga and stored securely on our systems.  

For Zynga’s full privacy notice, click here for US Job Applicant privacy notice and here for the Outside of the US Job Applicant Privacy Notice . You can email Privacy@zynga.com for more information regarding the collections and use of your data.
